name: SPEC_CONTAINERS
description: The specimen container ID for specimens with multiple containers.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_CONTAINER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the container associated with this specimen
